name: 3, 2, 1 - Liftoff!
description:
Journey from a rocket launch, a bird flying through the sky, to your average contemplation of beautiful ordinary things in the universe.

(This game will only play in a CHROME browser.) 

Some sprites inspired/modified from: https://rhythmlynx.itch.io/wip

Room transitions/concept inspired by: http://www.clairemorleyart.com/a-bitsy-tutorial
